author: Zaheena Rasheed
title: Trump weighs coronavirus lockdown in New York: Live updates
description: US president considering a quarantine for hotspots in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut as virus toll passes 2,000.
content:
Donald Trump has said he might prohibit travel in and out of the New York area to limit the spread of the coronavirus from its United States epicenter, as the death toll in the country surged past 2,000. 
But York Governor Andrew Cuomo slammed the US preside… [+3474 chars]
